Crimes.Crime_Name: Providing Inconsistent Testimony in Immigration Proceedings
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Negative due to hesitations, contradictions, and omissions
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Oral testimony, PIF, itinerary, detention details
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Refugee status based on fear of persecution
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Inconsistencies in identity, itinerary, and detention narrative
Crimes.Application_Error: Minor errors noted but not determinative
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Claimant must prove identity or provide reasonable explanation
Crimes.Application_Factor: Failure to provide consistent and credible evidence
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Whether RPD erred in credibility finding
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Lack of credibility due to inconsistent testimony
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Contradictions in testimony and written statements
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to RPD's adverse credibility assessment
Crimes.Omission_Type: Omissions in testimony regarding key events

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Credibility based on false documentation and inconsistent testimony
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Negative due to questionable documents and inconsistencies
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Birth certificate, testimony on itinerary, detention dates, addresses
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Refugee status based on fear of persecution
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Delayed acquisition of birth certificate, lack of security features, inconsistent details
Crimes.Application_Error: Minor errors acknowledged but outweighed by credibility concerns
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Claimant must prove identity or provide reasonable explanation
Crimes.Application_Factor: Failure to establish credible identity with documentation
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Whether RPD erred in concluding lack of credibility
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Doubts about authenticity of documents and credibility
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Questionable document authenticity and testimonial inconsistencies
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to RPD's adverse credibility and document authenticity findings

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Error of fact in credibility determination
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Negative due to contradictions and lack of supporting evidence
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Testimony on detention, itinerary, medical records
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Refugee status based on fear of persecution
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Discrepancies in testimony and absence of corroborating evidence
Crimes.Application_Error: Alleged error of fact, found not patent unreasonable
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Claimant must prove identity or provide reasonable explanation
Crimes.Application_Factor: Failure to verify key aspects of claim
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Whether RPD committed an error of fact
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Unverified claims and lack of medical corroboration
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to factual basis of credibility finding
Crimes.Omission_Type: Missing or conflicting details in application and testimony
